item.description:
We are going to take a look at some parks plus a couple woodland tracts on which I've been performing landscape restoration.

Park along Albemarle road between Crafts and North streets.  My vehicle: red ford pickup truck.

The map editor on this site likes to reposition the little peg indicating where we'll meet:  it places it along Albemarle road between Watertown and Crafts streets.  However, as I've already noted, we'll meet along Albemarle between CRAFTS AND NORTH STREETS.  Sorry about that; the map will get you pretty close, but just be sure to remember we'll actually be meeting a couple blocks north.

I've scheduled for Thursday, but if Friday works better I may be able to shift plans.
item.how_to_find_us: Park along Albemarle road between Crafts and North streets. My vehicle: red ford pickup truck.
item.name: Albemarle, Avery Woods, and other Newtonville Greenspace
